Items.Title: The City Clerk will call the Charter Meeting to order pursuant to Section 42 of the Charter.
Items.AgendaNote: THE CITY CLERK WILL CALL THE CHARTER MEETING TO ORDER PURSUANT TO SECTION 42 OF THE CHARTER.

Items.Title: The City Clerk will perform the ceremony of the duly elected Council Members taking their oath of office.
Items.AgendaNote: THE CITY CLERK WILL PERFORM THE CEREMONY OF THE DULY ELECTED COUNCIL MEMBERS TAKING THEIR OATH OF OFFICE.  Pursuant to M 0184-2023, the Board of Elections certified the November 7, 2023 General Election for the Members of the City Council.

Items.Title: INVOCATION
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Imam Shaykh Safraz Bacchus, Imam and Spiritual Leader, Masjid Alabidin located at 104-14 127 Street, Queens NY 11419.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Adams.

Items.Title: Continuation of the 2022-2023 Rules of the Council, As Amended.
Items.MinutesNote: The City Clerk (Mr. McSweeney) called for a voice-vote on the motion.
Items.MatterName: Continuation of the 2022-2023 Rules of the Council, as amended.

Items.Title: The City Clerk will open the floor for nominations for the office for Speaker of the Council of the City of New York pursuant to Section 44 of the New York City Charter for the term commencing January 1, 2024 and terminating December 31, 2025.
Items.MinutesNote: At this point, Council Member XXXXXXs nominated Council Member XXXXX as the next Speaker of the Council.  Council Member XXXXXX's motion was seconded by Council Members XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX..

Items.Title: ADJOURNED
Items.MinutesNote:
Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member xxxxx), adjourned these Charter proceedings to meet again for the Stated Meeting of January 18, 2024.



MICHAEL McSWEENEY, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council

Items.Title:
Nomination and Election of the
Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Items.AgendaNote: Nomination and Election of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Items.MatterName: Nomination and Election of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title:
At a duly convened meeting, we, the undersigned members of the Minority (Republican) Delegation of the Council of the City of New York, hereby designate and appoint Joseph C. Borelli as Minority Leader of the Council of the City of New York, pursuant to Rule 4.10 of the Rules of the Council of the City of New York for the term which commenced on January 1, 2024.

Signed: Joann Ariola, Joseph C. Borelli, David Carr, Vickie Paladino, Inna Vernikov and Kristy Marmorato

Pursuant to Rule 4.10 of the Council of the City of New York and Paragraph 5 of the Bylaws of the Minority Delegation of the same, I hereby designate and appoint Inna Vernikov as Minority Whip of the Council of the City of New York, for the term which commenced on January 1, 2024, effective January 3, 2024.

Signed: Joseph C. Borelli, Minority Leader
Designate and appoint Diana I. Ayala as Deputy Speaker of the Council of the City of New York, for the term which commenced on January 1, 2024, effective January 3, 2024.
Items.AgendaNote: Nomination and Election of Deputy Speaker

Items.Title: Designate and appoint Amanda C. Far√≠as as Majority Leader of the Council of the City of New York, for the term which commenced on January 1, 2024, effective January 3, 2024.
Designate and appoint Selvena N. Brooks-Powers as Majority Whip of the Council of the City of New York, for the term which commenced on January 1, 2024, effective January 3, 2024.
MESSAGES & PAPERS FROM THE MAYOR
Items.AgendaNote: MESSAGES & PAPERS FROM THE MAYOR - NONE

Items.Title: COMMUNICATION FROM CITY, COUNTY & BOROUGH OFFICES
Items.AgendaNote: COMMUNICATION FROM CITY, COUNTY & BOROUGH OFFICES - NONE

Items.MinutesNote: The City Clerk and Clerk of the Council (Mr. McSweeney) duly called this organizational Charter Meeting of Wednesday, January 3, 2024 to order pursuant to Section 42 of the Charter of the City of New York.
The City Clerk (Mr. McSweeney) delivered the ceremonial oath of office to all 51 duly elected Council Members).

The Invocation was delivered by Rev. Imam Shaykh Safraz Bacchus, Imam and Spirtual Leader, Masjid Alabidin located at 104-14 127 Street, Queens, N.Y. 11419.



Council Member Adams moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.
